Package org.sd.classifier

Interface Summary
ClassificationResult Immutable container for the results of running a classifier.
Classifier Interface for running classification over a feature vector.
FeatureAttribute Defines an attribute by name (schema level).
 

Class Summary
ArffAttributePruner Utility to prune attributes by name from an arff, including whole bags.
ArffBagCollapser An arff visitor for finding words exclusively in each bag.
ArffCutter Utility to cut attributes or instances from an arff.
ArffInfoPruner To prune features.
ArffMerger Utility that merges .arff and .src files for the same data-set, but which have been created via the cluster in a distributed manner.
ArffPruner To prune features.
ArffSampler  
ArffTranslator Base utility for translating one arff to another.
ArffVisitor Base utility for visiting the attributes and instances in an arff.
AttributeConstraints Class to manage constraints for a feature attribute.
BagOfWordsExtractor A primary feature extractor for extracting a bag of words.
BaseClassifierRunner Abstract base class for classifier runners and trainers.
BaseFeatureAttribute Abstract base implementation of the FeatureAttribute interface.
ClassifierRunner Utility class for loading and running a classifer, including feature extraction.
ClassifierTrainer Transforms RawLabeledData into ExtractedFeatures.
ExtractedFeatures Container for attributes (FeatureDictionary) and instances (FeatureVectors).
FeatureDictionary A class to keep track of all feature attributes added to feature vectors for a training set.
FeatureExtractionPipeline A feature extractor that executes a pipeline of feature extractors.
FeatureExtractor Class to process input to generate a feature vector.
FeatureVector Class to associate each of a set of feature attributes to an instantiated value.
InformationGainFeatureSorter Scratch-pad to play with information gain, entropy, etc on features.
IntegerFeatureAttribute An integer feature attribute definition class.
LabeledInput Immutable container for a label and an input.
NominalFeatureAttribute A nominal feature attribute definition class.
NumericFeatureAttribute A numeric feature attribute definition class.
PrimaryFeatureExtractor A classification framework feature extractor wrapper around a org.sd.extract.Extractor or ExtractionPipeline.
RealFeatureAttribute A real number feature attribute definition class.
StepFeatureExtractor A feature extractor that steps down into its input to apply another extractor.
WekaClassificationResult Implementation specific to a WekaClassifier.
WekaClassifier Represents a trained Weka classifier in execution.
WekaTreeFlattener When Weka trains a tree (like J48), it outputs a text representation of that tree, which is converted to individuals rules with this tool.
WekaTreeFlattener.Classification  
WekaTreeFlattener.Node  
 

Enum Summary
AttributeType Enum for types of feature attributes.
